bibl.title: Mummy Labels from Graeco-Roman Egypt in National Museums Scotland, Edinburgh.
bibl.note: Publication of ten mummy labels from Panopolis and Thebes, now kept in National Museums Scotland in Edinburgh. - 1. Mummy label of Sansnos (Greek and Demotic). Inv. A.1921.895. Akhmim, AD II-III. - 2. False mummy label of Apollonios (Greek and Demotic). Inv. A.1921.896. - 3. False mummy label of Pachoumis (Greek and Demotic). Inv. A.1921.896A. - 4. Mummy label of Petesis (Greek and Demotic). Inv. A.1921.896B. Bompae, AD 190-210. - 5. Mummy label of Patmethis (Greek, Demotic and hieratic). Inv. A.1921.897. Psonis, AD II. - 6. Mummy label of Peteminis (Demotic and hieratic). Inv. A.1921.897A. Panopolites, AD III (?). - 7. Mummy label of Horion son of Psenmonthes (Greek). Inv. A.1956.169. Thebes (?), AD II-III. - 8. Mummy label of Horion son of Pamonthes (Greek). Inv. A.1956.170. Thebes (?), AD II-III. - 9. Mummy label of Tlatei (Greek). Inv. A.1956.171. Thebes (?), AD II-III (?). - 10. Mummy label of Tsose (Greek). Inv. A.1956.172. Thebes (?), AD II-III. On the verso, representation of the Anubis dog.
bibl.seg: 143.11 / 143.12 T. Edinburgh National Mus. Scotlands Inv. A.1921.897A 143.11 / 143.12 / 143.4 T. Edinburgh National Mus. Scotlands Inv. A.1921.897 143.12 / 143.4 T. Edinburgh National Mus. Scotlands Inv. A.1921.895; A.1921.896B 143.4 T. Edinburgh National Mus. Scotlands Inv. A.1956.169; A.1956.170; A.1956.171; A.1956.172
W. Clarysse, M. Maitland & K.A. Worp, Mummy Labels from Graeco-Roman Egypt in National Museums Scotland, Edinburgh.
ChrEg 89 (2014) No. 178, pp. 356-375, 1 arbre généal., 5 pll.

Publication of ten mummy labels from Panopolis and Thebes, now kept in National Museums Scotland in Edinburgh. - 1. Mummy label of Sansnos (Greek and Demotic). Inv. A.1921.895. Akhmim, AD II-III. - 2. False mummy label of Apollonios (Greek and Demotic). Inv. A.1921.896. - 3. False mummy label of Pachoumis (Greek and Demotic). Inv. A.1921.896A. - 4. Mummy label of Petesis (Greek and Demotic). Inv. A.1921.896B. Bompae, AD 190-210. - 5. Mummy label of Patmethis (Greek, Demotic and hieratic). Inv. A.1921.897. Psonis, AD II. - 6. Mummy label of Peteminis (Demotic and hieratic). Inv. A.1921.897A. Panopolites, AD III (?). - 7. Mummy label of Horion son of Psenmonthes (Greek). Inv. A.1956.169. Thebes (?), AD II-III. - 8. Mummy label of Horion son of Pamonthes (Greek). Inv. A.1956.170. Thebes (?), AD II-III. - 9. Mummy label of Tlatei (Greek). Inv. A.1956.171. Thebes (?), AD II-III (?). - 10. Mummy label of Tsose (Greek). Inv. A.1956.172. Thebes (?), AD II-III. On the verso, representation of the Anubis dog.
